CONTENTS.P: Procurement reference: 9064-IFT-42471
Project name: Osh Solid Waste Project
Country: Kyrgyz Republic
Business sector: Municipal and environmental infrastructure
Project ID: 42471
Funding source: EBRD, EIB, EU IFCA
Type of contract: Project goods, works and services
Type of notice: Invitation for tenders
Issue date: 17.4.2018
Closing date: 31.5.2018 at 14:00 local time

This Invitation for Tenders follows the General Procurement Notice for this project which was published on the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD or the Bank) website, Procurement Notices (www.ebrd.com) on 3.5.2017.

The Municipal Enterprise “Osh Tazalyk” of the City of Osh hereinafter referred to as “the Purchaser”, intends to use part of the proceeds of a loan from the Bank, a loan from the European Investment Bank (EIB) and a grant for European Union Infrastructure Facility for Central Asia (EU IFCA) towards the cost of Osh Solid Waste Project.
The Purchaser now invites sealed tenders from Suppliers for the following Contracts to be funded from part of the proceeds of the loans and the grant:
— Lot 1: Supply of 1 136 units of metallic waste containers with a round lid, 1100 litre capacity each container,
— Lot 2: Supply of 32 units of metallic removable skip containers of 8 m3 capacity each for collection of bulky waste and construction debris.
Tenders are invited for one or more lots. Each lot must be priced separately. Tenders for more than one lot may offer discounts and such discounts will be considered in the comparison of tenders.
Tendering for contracts that are to be financed with the proceeds of EBRD and EIB loans and EU IFCA grant is open to firms from any country.
To be qualified for the award of a Contract, Tenderers must satisfy the following minimum criteria:

a) average annual turnover is not less than: Lot 1: 560 000 EUR (five hundred and sixty thousand), Lot 2: 70 000 EUR (seventy thousand) equivalent, calculated as total certified payments received for contracts in progress or completed, within the last 5 years;

b) experience as Supplier, in at least 3 contracts within the last 5 years, each with a value of at least: Lot 1: 300 000 EUR (three hundred thousand), Lot 2: 35 000 EUR (thirty five) equivalent, that have been successfully and substantially completed and that are similar to the proposed Goods (i.e. containers for solid waste).
The goods shall be delivered within 4 months from the date of receipt of the advance payment.

Tender documents may be obtained from the office at the address below upon payment of a non-refundable fee of 50 EUR (fifty) or equivalent in another convertible currency or Kyrgyz Som at the rate of the National Bank of the Kyrgyz Republic on the date of payment.
SME Osh Tazalyk in Osh City
Beneficiary Bank: CJSC Kyrgyz Investment Credit Bank, Bishkek, Kyrgyz Republic
SWIFT: KICBKG22
Correspondent bank: PJSC TransCapitalBank, Moscow, Russia
SWIFT: TJSCRUMM
Intermediary Bank of TransCapitalBank:
CitiBank NA, New York, USA
SWIFT: CITIUS33
Payment reference: fee for Waste containers tender document

Upon receiving appropriate evidence of payment of the non-refundable fee, the documents will be promptly dispatched by courier, however, no liability can be accepted for loss or late delivery. If requested the documents can also be dispatched electronically after the presentation by the prospective tenderer of appropriate evidence of payment of the non-refundable fee. In the event of any discrepancy between electronic and hard copies of the documents, the hard copy shall prevail.
All tenders must be accompanied by a tender security of:
— Lot 1: 7 500 EUR (seven thousand five hundred) equivalent,
— Lot 2: 1 000 EUR (one thousand) equivalent.

Tenders must be delivered to the office at the address below on or before 31.5.2018 at 14:00 local time, at which time they will be opened in the presence of those Tenderers’ representatives who choose to attend.
Municipal Enterprise Osh Tazalyk, Shakirova Str., 20, City of Osh, Kyrgyz Republic.

The applicable procurement rules are the Bank’s Procurement Policies and Rules (Rev. October 2014) which can be located at: http://www.ebrd.com/news/publications/policies/procurement-policies-and-rules.html
A register of potential Tenderers who have purchased the tender documents may be inspected at the address below.
Prospective Tenderers may obtain further information from, and also inspect and acquire the tender documents at, the following office:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: Contact name: Mr. Talant Kaparov, Director, Purchasing entity:

Closing date: 31.5.2018 at 14:00 local time

This Invitation for Tenders follows the General Procurement Notice for this project which was published on the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD or the Bank) website, Procurement Notices (www.ebrd.com) on 3.5.2017.

The Municipal Enterprise “Osh Tazalyk” of the City of Osh hereinafter referred to as “the Purchaser”, intends to use part of the proceeds of a loan from the Bank, a loan from the European Investment Bank (EIB) and a grant for European Union Infrastructure Facility for Central Asia (EU IFCA) towards the cost of Osh Solid Waste Project.
The Purchaser now invites sealed tenders from Suppliers for the following Contracts to be funded from part of the proceeds of the loans and the grant:
— Lot 1: Supply of 1 136 units of metallic waste containers with a round lid, 1100 litre capacity each container,
— Lot 2: Supply of 32 units of metallic removable skip containers of 8 m3 capacity each for collection of bulky waste and construction debris.
Tenders are invited for one or more lots. Each lot must be priced separately. Tenders for more than one lot may offer discounts and such discounts will be considered in the comparison of tenders.
Tendering for contracts that are to be financed with the proceeds of EBRD and EIB loans and EU IFCA grant is open to firms from any country.
To be qualified for the award of a Contract, Tenderers must satisfy the following minimum criteria:

a) average annual turnover is not less than: Lot 1: 560 000 EUR (five hundred and sixty thousand), Lot 2: 70 000 EUR (seventy thousand) equivalent, calculated as total certified payments received for contracts in progress or completed, within the last 5 years;

b) experience as Supplier, in at least 3 contracts within the last 5 years, each with a value of at least: Lot 1: 300 000 EUR (three hundred thousand), Lot 2: 35 000 EUR (thirty five) equivalent, that have been successfully and substantially completed and that are similar to the proposed Goods (i.e. containers for solid waste).
The goods shall be delivered within 4 months from the date of receipt of the advance payment.

Tender documents may be obtained from the office at the address below upon payment of a non-refundable fee of 50 EUR (fifty) or equivalent in another convertible currency or Kyrgyz Som at the rate of the National Bank of the Kyrgyz Republic on the date of payment.

CONTENTS.P: Procurement reference: 9064-IFT-42471
Project name: Osh Solid Waste Project
Country: Kyrgyz Republic
Business sector: Municipal and environmental infrastructure
Project ID: 42471
Funding source: EBRD, EIB, EU IFCA
Type of contract: Project goods, works and services
Type of notice: Invitation for tenders
Issue date: 17.4.2018
Closing date: 31.5.2018 at 14:00 local time

This Invitation for Tenders follows the General Procurement Notice for this project which was published on the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD or the Bank) website, Procurement Notices (www.ebrd.com) on 3.5.2017.

The Municipal Enterprise “Osh Tazalyk” of the City of Osh hereinafter referred to as “the Purchaser”, intends to use part of the proceeds of a loan from the Bank, a loan from the European Investment Bank (EIB) and a grant for European Union Infrastructure Facility for Central Asia (EU IFCA) towards the cost of Osh Solid Waste Project.
The Purchaser now invites sealed tenders from Suppliers for the following Contracts to be funded from part of the proceeds of the loans and the grant:
— Lot 1: Supply of 1 136 units of metallic waste containers with a round lid, 1100 litre capacity each container,
— Lot 2: Supply of 32 units of metallic removable skip containers of 8 m3 capacity each for collection of bulky waste and construction debris.
Tenders are invited for one or more lots. Each lot must be priced separately. Tenders for more than one lot may offer discounts and such discounts will be considered in the comparison of tenders.
Tendering for contracts that are to be financed with the proceeds of EBRD and EIB loans and EU IFCA grant is open to firms from any country.
To be qualified for the award of a Contract, Tenderers must satisfy the following minimum criteria:

a) average annual turnover is not less than: Lot 1: 560 000 EUR (five hundred and sixty thousand), Lot 2: 70 000 EUR (seventy thousand) equivalent, calculated as total certified payments received for contracts in progress or completed, within the last 5 years;

b) experience as Supplier, in at least 3 contracts within the last 5 years, each with a value of at least: Lot 1: 300 000 EUR (three hundred thousand), Lot 2: 35 000 EUR (thirty five) equivalent, that have been successfully and substantially completed and that are similar to the proposed Goods (i.e. containers for solid waste).
The goods shall be delivered within 4 months from the date of receipt of the advance payment.

Tender documents may be obtained from the office at the address below upon payment of a non-refundable fee of 50 EUR (fifty) or equivalent in another convertible currency or Kyrgyz Som at the rate of the National Bank of the Kyrgyz Republic on the date of payment.
SME Osh Tazalyk in Osh City
Beneficiary Bank: CJSC Kyrgyz Investment Credit Bank, Bishkek, Kyrgyz Republic
SWIFT: KICBKG22
Correspondent bank: PJSC TransCapitalBank, Moscow, Russia
SWIFT: TJSCRUMM
Intermediary Bank of TransCapitalBank:
CitiBank NA, New York, USA
SWIFT: CITIUS33
Payment reference: fee for Waste containers tender document

Upon receiving appropriate evidence of payment of the non-refundable fee, the documents will be promptly dispatched by courier, however, no liability can be accepted for loss or late delivery. If requested the documents can also be dispatched electronically after the presentation by the prospective tenderer of appropriate evidence of payment of the non-refundable fee. In the event of any discrepancy between electronic and hard copies of the documents, the hard copy shall prevail.
All tenders must be accompanied by a tender security of:
— Lot 1: 7 500 EUR (seven thousand five hundred) equivalent,
— Lot 2: 1 000 EUR (one thousand) equivalent.

Tenders must be delivered to the office at the address below on or before 31.5.2018 at 14:00 local time, at which time they will be opened in the presence of those Tenderers’ representatives who choose to attend.
Municipal Enterprise Osh Tazalyk, Shakirova Str., 20, City of Osh, Kyrgyz Republic.

The applicable procurement rules are the Bank’s Procurement Policies and Rules (Rev. October 2014) which can be located at: http://www.ebrd.com/news/publications/policies/procurement-policies-and-rules.html
